item.title: India fines Google $113 million for abusing the Play Store's dominance
item.description: India fines Google $113 million for abusing the Play Store’s dominance Google is on the hook for another nine-figure fine after Indiaâ€™s antitrust agency said the company abused the dominant position of the Play Store.
